ConferenceNumber.name: ConferenceNumber
ConferenceNumber.description: Holds the telephone number for an external event shown in the Salesforce Today feature in the Salesforce mobile app.

AccessCode.description: Specifies the access code to enter in order to validate identity and join the call.

ExternalEventId.description: The ID of the external event associated with the conference number.

IsLocked.description: Returns true if the conference number is locked, or false if it’s not.

Label.description: The description of the conference number.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the conference number can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the conference call’s organizer.

Number.description: The phone number used to connect to the conference call.

Vendor.description: The vendor or company associated with the conference number.
